line_1: To have and hold for ever and for ay;
line_2: Determine Florio witty, young and gay,

line_1: But in prime Vigour what can last for ay?
line_2: I whilom sung, wrought in his Works decay:
By many a lord an' lady;

line_1: For King's are unco scant ay,
line_2: They're better just than want ay
